data.lyric:
[ti:Singles You Up]
[ar:Jordan Davis]
[al:Beat The Heat Country Summer Jams]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Singles You Up - Jordan Davis
[00:05.39]Written by：Jordan Davis/Steven Dale Jones/Justin Ebach
[00:10.79]I ain't heard you laugh like that in a long time
[00:13.93]
[00:15.59]I wonder if you stopped his world like you did mine just now
[00:19.22]
[00:20.36]I see you sippin' white wine instead of whiskey
[00:23.05]
[00:24.93]And does he want you to be just a little more city
[00:27.87]Well I'm sorry if I'm overstepping boundaries
[00:32.29]I don't mean to be but I've just got to tell you how I feel
[00:37.94]
[00:39.26]If he ever singles you up if he's ever stupid enough
[00:43.99]I'ma be the first one calling you baby baby
[00:48.80]If he ain't holding you tight if he ain't treating you right
[00:53.59]I'ma be the first one calling him crazy crazy
[00:58.15]'Cause girl it's just a matter of time until you find
[01:00.28]That the right guy's staring you back into your eyes right now
[01:03.68]No rush but if he ever singles you up
[01:07.96]
[01:13.23]He hasn't even looked your way since you walked in
[01:15.98]
[01:17.96]But I can't help it that I can't take my eyes off of you
[01:22.09]Your favorite song just came on and me and you were singing along
[01:26.50]And he don't even know a single word
[01:30.98]
[01:32.02]If he ever singles you up if he's ever stupid enough
[01:36.80]I'ma be the first one calling you baby baby
[01:41.53]If he ain't holding you tight if he ain't treating you right
[01:46.35]I'ma be the first one calling him crazy crazy
[01:51.00]'Cause girl it's just a matter of time until you find
[01:53.08]That the right guy's staring you back into your eyes right now
[01:56.54]No rush but if he ever singles you up
[02:00.83]
[02:03.39]If he ever singles you up
[02:05.75]I'ma be the first to call baby
[02:08.41]
[02:10.52]Sorry if I'm overstepping boundaries
[02:13.25]I don't mean to be but I've just got to tell you how I feel
[02:18.47]
[02:20.12]If he ever singles you up if he's ever stupid enough
[02:24.85]I'ma be the first one calling you baby baby
[02:29.50]If he ain't holding you tight if he ain't treating you right
[02:34.41]I'ma be the first one calling him crazy crazy
[02:38.76]'Cause girl it's just a matter of time until you find
[02:41.04]That the right guy's staring you back into your eyes right now
[02:44.54]No rush but if he ever singles you up
[02:48.83]
[02:50.98]Oh if he ever singles you up
[02:54.22]
[02:56.00]If he ever singles you up
data.trans:
[ti:Singles You Up]
[ar:Jordan Davis]
[al:Beat The Heat Country Summer Jams]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.25]//
[00:10.50]我很久没有听到你那样的笑声了
[00:13.64]
[00:15.30]我想知道你是否像刚才对我那样 把他的世界也搅得天翻地覆
[00:18.93]
[00:20.07]我看你喝的是白葡萄酒 而不是威士忌
[00:22.77]
[00:24.64]他想让你变得更潮流奢靡吗
[00:27.58]如果我越界了 那我很抱歉
[00:32.00]我不是故意的 但我只想告诉你我的感受
[00:37.65]
[00:38.97]如果他曾与你分手 如果他曾那么愚蠢
[00:43.70]我会是第一个叫你宝贝的人 宝贝
[00:48.52]如果他没有紧紧抱住你 如果他没有好好对待你
[00:53.30]我会第一个去骂他疯子 疯子
[00:57.86]因为女孩 一切都只是时间问题 直到你发现
[00:59.99]此时那个命中注定的人正在朝你深情凝视
[01:03.39]不要着急 除非他曾与你分手
[01:07.67]
[01:12.95]自从你走进来 他甚至都没有看过你的样子
[01:15.69]
[01:17.67]但我情不自禁 我的视线无法从你身上移开
[01:21.80]你最喜欢的歌才刚刚开始 我们一起放声歌唱
[01:26.22]他甚至都不知道一句歌词
[01:30.69]
[01:31.73]如果他曾与你分手 如果他曾那么愚蠢
[01:36.51]我会是第一个叫你宝贝的人 宝贝
[01:41.24]如果他没有紧紧抱住你 如果他没有好好对待你
[01:46.06]我会第一个去骂他疯子 疯子
[01:50.71]因为女孩 一切都只是时间问题 直到你发现
[01:52.79]此时那个命中注定的人正在朝你深情凝视
[01:56.26]不要着急 除非他曾与你分手
[02:00.54]
[02:03.11]如果他曾与你分手
[02:05.46]我会是第一个叫你宝贝的人
[02:08.12]
[02:10.23]如果我越界了 那我很抱歉
[02:12.96]我不是故意的 但我只想告诉你我的感受
[02:18.18]
[02:19.83]如果他曾与你分手 如果他曾那么愚蠢
[02:24.57]我会是第一个叫你宝贝的人 宝贝
[02:29.22]如果他没有紧紧抱住你 如果他没有好好对待你
[02:34.12]我会第一个去骂他疯子 疯子
[02:38.48]因为女孩 一切都只是时间问题 直到你发现
[02:40.75]此时那个命中注定的人正在朝你深情凝视
[02:44.25]不要着急 除非他曾与你分手
[02:48.54]
[02:50.69]如果他曾与你分手
